author: Susan Thorpe
text: We have seen a resurgence of stray shopping carts in places they should not be. I am searching for best practices for keeping shopping carts off the streets and on the property where they are used. Also, tips for dealing with the resistance of stores to potential regulations.  I appreciate your help.
title: Shopping Cart regulations - best practices
